meanings.sent1: The nonconsumptive behavior of recycling helps protect the environment.
meanings.sent2: The company implemented nonconsumptive practices to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nonconsumptive shopping habits were saving her money.
meanings.sent4: His nonconsumptive lifestyle was like a breath of fresh air in a world of excess.
meanings.sent5: The nonconsumptive approach to energy conservation was both innovative and effective.

meanings.definition: Not involving the consumption of goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The nonconsumptive activities at the park were free for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The nonconsumptive tourism industry focuses on experiences rather than products.
meanings.sent3: Their nonconsumptive vacation was a refreshing change from the usual shopping trips.
meanings.sent4: The nonconsumptive mindset of the community led to a more sustainable lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: Choosing nonconsumptive entertainment options can be both fun and eco-friendly.
